}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== PCB is green and "HB97 250-01798-050" is silkscreened on the front. :AR5B97 version from [[Foxconn]], Model T77H167.00
There are different versions of this card with different OUIs. :Antenna connectors has silkscreened "CH1" and "CH0".
Used in the notebook models: *'''[[Acer]]''' ''Aspire'' 5745, 5745G *'''[[Sony]]''' ''Vaio'' VPCF11, VPCF12, VPCF13
[[Category:English Documentation]]
